changes: Added import of warmupCache from storage module
Added optional cache warm-up logic wrapped in condition based on CACHE_WARMUP_ON_START environment variable
Implementation is non-blocking using fire-and-forget pattern with error handling
src/index.ts.purpose: Main application entry point that now supports optional cache warm-up on startup
src/index.ts.key_modification: Added environment-variable controlled cache warm-up feature

changes: Added warmupCache function to load all API keys into memory cache
Function includes proper error handling and conditional logging
Uses existing cache infrastructure (apiKeyCache) and storage functions
Includes development-specific logging for cache statistics
src/storage.ts.purpose: Storage module extended with cache warming functionality
src/storage.ts.key_modification: New export function for pre-loading cache on application startup

patterns_discovered: Graceful error handling that doesn't block application startup
Optional feature implementation using environment flags
gotchas_discovered: Cache warm-up should be optional and not block startup
Error handling must not crash the application if warm-up fails
Logging should be conditional to avoid production noise
Cache warming should only run when cache is enabled
Development environment should have more detailed logging

approach_outcome.approach: Implemented optional cache warm-up as a non-blocking feature controlled by environment variable
approach_outcome.efficiency: High - uses existing infrastructure and follows established patterns
approach_outcome.maintainability: High - clean separation of concerns with proper error handling
approach_outcome.scalability: Good - handles large numbers of API keys efficiently

recommendations: Consider adding cache warm-up progress reporting for large deployments
Add metrics or monitoring for cache warm-up performance
Consider implementing incremental warm-up for very large key sets
Add documentation about the CACHE_WARMUP_ON_START environment variable
Consider adding cache validation/health check after warm-up
